1 // This is a ROS version of the standard "hello ardrone" program.
2 
3 // This header defines the standard ROS classes.
4 #include <ardrone_autonomy/Navdata.h>
5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include <signal.h>
7 #include "geometry_msgs/Twist.h"
8 #include "std_msgs/Empty.h"
9 
10 struct ControlCommand
11 {
12  inline ControlCommand()
13  {
14  roll = pitch = yaw = gaz = 0;
15  }
16  inline ControlCommand(double roll, double pitch, double yaw, double gaz)
17  {
18  this->roll = roll;
19  this->pitch = pitch;
20  this->yaw = yaw;
21  this->gaz = gaz;
22  }
23  double yaw, roll, pitch, gaz;
24 };
25 
26 ros::Publisher land_pub;
27 ros::Publisher vel_pub;
28 // double desired_alt;
29 bool isControlling = false;
30 ardrone_autonomy::Navdata lastNavdataReceived;
31 
32 void navdataCb(const ardrone_autonomy::Navdata::ConstPtr navdataPtr)
33 {
34  lastNavdataReceived = *navdataPtr;
35  // ROS_INFO("altd: %i", lastNavdataReceived.altd);
36 }
37 
38 void basic_sigint_handler(int sig)
39 {
40  land_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
41  ros::shutdown();
42 }
43 
44 // Altitude controller
45 void path_regu_altitude(double *zvel_cmd, double alt_mes, double alt_desired)
46 {
47  if (alt_mes < alt_desired)
48  {
49  *zvel_cmd = 0.5;
50  }
51  else
52  {
53  *zvel_cmd = -0.5;
54  }
55 }
56 
57 // To send the command to the drone
58 void sendControlToDrone(ControlCommand cmd)
59 {
60  geometry_msgs::Twist cmdT;
61  cmdT.angular.z = -cmd.yaw;
62  cmdT.linear.z = cmd.gaz;
63  cmdT.linear.x = -cmd.pitch;
64  cmdT.linear.y = -cmd.roll;
65 
66  // assume that while actively controlling, the above for will never be equal to zero, so i will never hover.
67  cmdT.angular.x = cmdT.angular.y = 0;
68 
69  if (isControlling)
70  {
71  vel_pub.publish(cmdT);
72  // lastSentControl = cmd;
73  }
74 
75  // lastControlSentMS = getMS(ros::Time::now());
76 }
77 
78 int main(int argc, char **argv)
79 {
80  // Initialise the ROS client library. NoSigintHandler option to be able to manage the ctrl+c key ourselves here under.
81  ros::init(argc, argv, "basic_controller", ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
82 
83  // Establish this program as a ROS node.
84  ros::NodeHandle nh;
85 
86  // Override the default ros singint handler (must be set after the nodeHandle is created)
87  signal(SIGINT, basic_sigint_handler);
88 
89  // Send some output as a log message.
90  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Hello, ROS!");
91 
92  std::string navdata_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/navdata");
93  ros::Subscriber navdata_sub = nh.subscribe(navdata_channel, 10, &navdataCb);
94 
95  std::string control_channel = nh.resolveName("cmd_vel");
96  std::string takeoff_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/takeoff");
97  std::string land_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/land");
98  std::string toggleState_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/reset");
99 
100  ros::Publisher toggleState_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(toggleState_channel, 1, true);
101  ros::Publisher takeoff_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(takeoff_channel, 1, true);
102  land_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Empty>(land_channel, 1);
103  vel_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>(control_channel, 1);
104 
105  // Mission
106  // toggleState_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
107  takeoff_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
108  ros::Duration(10).sleep(); // Wait for 10s
109  isControlling = true;
110 
111  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Hello, ROS!");
112 
113  float alt_desired;
114  ControlCommand cmd;
115  double zvel_cmd;
116  ros::Time tic;
117  ros::Time toc;
118  ros::Rate r(200); // 200Hz
119 
120  // while not emergency land {
121  alt_desired = 1500;
122  tic = ros::Time::now();
123  toc = tic;
124  while (ros::ok() && (alt_desired > lastNavdataReceived.altd || toc - tic < ros::Duration(6)))
125  {
126  path_regu_altitude(&zvel_cmd, lastNavdataReceived.altd, alt_desired);
127  cmd = ControlCommand(0, 0, 0, zvel_cmd);
128  sendControlToDrone(cmd);
129  ros::spinOnce();
130  r.sleep();
131  toc = ros::Time::now();
132  }
133  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Hello, 1.5m!");
134 
135  alt_desired = 1000;
136  tic = ros::Time::now();
137  while (ros::ok() && (alt_desired < lastNavdataReceived.altd || toc - tic < ros::Duration(6)))
138  {
139  path_regu_altitude(&zvel_cmd, lastNavdataReceived.altd, alt_desired);
140  cmd = ControlCommand(0, 0, 0, zvel_cmd);
141  sendControlToDrone(cmd);
142  ros::spinOnce();
143  r.sleep();
144  toc = ros::Time::now();
145  }
146  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Hello, 1m!");
147 
148  alt_desired = 1500;
149  tic = ros::Time::now();
150  while (ros::ok() && (alt_desired > lastNavdataReceived.altd || toc - tic < ros::Duration(6)))
151  {
152  path_regu_altitude(&zvel_cmd, lastNavdataReceived.altd, alt_desired);
153  cmd = ControlCommand(0, 0, 0, zvel_cmd);
154  sendControlToDrone(cmd);
155  ros::spinOnce();
156  r.sleep();
157  toc = ros::Time::now();
158  }
159  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Hello, 1.5m!");
160  //}
161 
162  land_pub.publish(std_msgs::Empty());
163 
164  // let ROS do some stuff
165  //
166  ros::spin();
167 
168  /*
169  while(ros::ok())
170  {
171  ros::spinOnce();
172  }
173  */
174 }
